change_summary.what_changed: The blog content was replaced with a 'Page not found' error page, including a cookie consent banner and navigation menu.
specific_changes: Introduction of a cookie consent banner
Display of a 'Page not found' error message
Presence of a navigation menu with links to different categories and pages

strategic_analysis.business_impact: The change may impact user experience and navigation on the website, potentially affecting engagement and conversion rates.
strategic_analysis.strategic_direction: The change suggests a focus on website optimization and user experience, potentially paving the way for future content or feature updates.
strategic_analysis.competitive_implications: The update may indicate a focus on user privacy and regulatory compliance, potentially influencing competitor strategies.

threats: Potential negative impact on user engagement due to changed website structure
Compliance risks if cookie regulations are not fully met
key_findings: The website now includes a cookie consent banner
The 'Page not found' error page is customized with navigation and search functionality
opportunities: Optimizing website content and structure for improved user experience
Enhancing cookie consent and privacy features to build trust with users
recommended_actions: Monitor user feedback and engagement metrics to assess the impact of the change
Review and refine cookie consent and privacy features to ensure compliance and transparency

key_insights: The website now includes a cookie consent banner
The 'Page not found' error page is customized with navigation and search functionality
